titleStmt.title: The general exercise ordered by His Highness the Prince of Orange, to be punctually observed of all the infantry in service of the States General of the United Provinces being a most worthy compendium, very useful for all persons concerned in that noble exercise of arms.
titleStmt.author: Plunket, Thomas, b. 1625.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to T. Plunket. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
